title: T206 / T205s - all HOFs / graded (lower grades)
author: Section103

posts.post_title: T206 / T205s - all HOFs / graded (lower grades)
posts.post_content:
Im at a point where Im pretty much going to liquidate my HOF collection.  I'll post other threads of cards for sale in the other applicable areas (20s, 50s, EMDWs).  Ive already posted a thread on some cards I have up on eBay including a PSA5 E91 Plank and an Old Judge Hugh Duffy (see here: [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=128641"]4 Sale on eBay[/URL] )

T206/T205 Hall of Famers
T205 Frank Chance - PSA1 - SOLD
T205 Joe Tinker - ungraded - $30
T206 Roger Bresnahan - Sovereign - PSA2 - $70
T206 Vic Willis - Polar Bear - BVG1.5 - $60
T206 M. Brown - Sweet Cap - BVG1 - SOLD
T206 Rube Marquard - Sweet Cap - SGC1.5 - SOLD
T206 W. Keeler - EPDG - BVG1.5 - SOLD
T206 Ed Walsh - Pied - PSA1 - SOLD
T206 Rube Waddell - Sweet Cap - BVG1.5 - SOLD
T206 Addie Joss - Sweet Cap - PSA1 - SOLD
T206 Tris Speaker - Pied - BVG1 - SOLD
T206 Chief Bender - Pied - BVG1.5 - SOLD
T206 C. Mathewson - Sweet Cap - BVG1 - SOLD
T206 Cy Young - Sweet Cap - BVG1 - SOLD

Pics of the above (and all other cards for sale, in other folders) can be seen here: [URL="http://ImageEvent.com/section103/tobaccosforsale"]T205/T206s for sale[/URL]

Prices include shipping.  Paypal gift or add 3% please.  Email or PM, first reply to either gets priority.
PM me the details; I'll do paypal gift.
I will take the Speaker off your hands--paypal gift as well.  PM details and thanks
...it went quickly.  Thank you for your interest, though.
I'll take t206 young portrait if still available. E-mail being sent.
